displaytitle: Madonna and Child, with Two Saints
creditline: Bequest of Carl Otto von Kienbusch, Class of 1906, for the Carl Otto von Kienbusch, Jr. Memorial Collection

titles.title: Madonna and Child, with Two Saints

texts.textentryhtml: J. de Bom, Antwerp (until 1909; sale, Salle Buyle, Antwerp, Feb. 2, 1909, lot 9); Ehrich Galleries, New York (by 1913-1922; sale, Anderson Galleries/American Art Association, New York, May 9-10, 1922, lot 106, to Pressinger); Austin E. Pressinger (1922-[d. 1926]); by descent to Carl Otto von Kienbusch (until 1977; bequest to Princeton University Art Museum). [n.b. Pressinger was Kienbusch’s father-in-law).<!--?xml:namespace prefix = "o" ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" /-->
